html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-13092022-12-07NRCAN,  ,  ,  , 
ActEnergy Efficiency Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Energy Efficiency Regulations, 2016 (Amendment 17)
PrecisRegulations Amending the ENERGY EFFICIENCY REGULATIONS, 2016 (AMENDMENT 17) in order to (1) update energy efficiency and testing standards for central air conditioners and central heat pumps primarily used in the residential sector; (2) make other minor changes to the scope, prescribed information, energy efficiency standards, or testing standards for currently regulated products to address known issues with Canadian requirements and to align with the United States more clearly; and (3) specify 60 energy-using products in order for the Minister to exercise the ministerial regulations authority to maintain harmonization between requirements set out in another jurisdiction.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0265 Publication Date: 2022-12-21
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Energy Efficiency Regulations, 2016 (Amendment 17)
precis: Regulations Amending the ENERGY EFFICIENCY REGULATIONS, 2016 (AMENDMENT 17) in order to (1) update energy efficiency and testing standards for central air conditioners and central heat pumps primarily used in the residential sector; (2) make other minor changes to the scope, prescribed information, energy efficiency standards, or testing standards for currently regulated products to address known issues with Canadian requirements and to align with the United States more clearly; and (3) specify 60 energy-using products in order for the Minister to exercise the ministerial regulations authority to maintain harmonization between requirements set out in another jurisdiction.
